page.description: The .TEXTREPLACE() method places text into a text control.
page.syntax: .TEXTREPLACE( Start_Position as N, Length as N, New_Text as C [, Processed as L ] )

argument.name: Start_Position
argument.description: The beginning character to select. The first character is number 1.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: Optional. Default = 0. The number of characters to select. Enter -1 to select all characters.

argument.name: New_Text
argument.description: The text to substitute for the selection.

page.example: dim ptr as P dim fld as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() fld = ptr.Child("Lastname") ' assume the field contains "lastname" fld.TextReplace(5, 0, "insert") -> "lastinsertname" fld.textreplace(5, 6, "") -> "lastname"
